mapper.select: select l.lid, l.l_image, l.l_desc, l.l_date, pl.p_latitude, pl.p_longtitude, p.pe_name from LikePlace as l join Pet as p on l.peid = p.peid join Place as pl on l.pid = pl.pid where l.p_location=#{p_location} and l.l_flag=0 order by l.l_date desc;

select l.lid, l.l_image, l.l_desc, l.l_date, pl.p_latitude, pl.p_longtitude, p.pe_name from LikePlace as l join Pet as p on l.peid = p.peid join Place as pl on l.pid = pl.pid where l.p_location=#{p_location} and l.l_flag=0 order by l.l_like desc;

select l.lid, l.l_image, l.l_desc, l.l_date, pl.p_latitude, pl.p_longtitude, p.pe_name from LikePlace as l join Pet as p on l.peid = p.peid join Place as pl on l.pid = pl.pid where l.p_location=#{p_location} and l.l_flag=0 order by l.l_like desc limit 5;
